appraisers.name: Jennifer Lynch | Pinpoint Fine Art Appraisal

content.about: Jennifer Lynch | Pinpoint Fine Art Appraisal provides professional art appraisal services specializing in Printmaking, Photography. With 20+ years experience, we offer expert valuations for insurance, estate planning, charitable donations, and more.
content.notes: MFA graduate from Hunter College with over 20 years of experience; known for expertise in printmaking and photography.

reviews.author: Susan W.
reviews.content: Their expertise in fine art made the appraisal process smooth and thorough.

reviews.author: Michael S.
reviews.content: Extremely professional and knowledgeable. The appraisal was detailed and delivered on time.

reviews.author: James C.
reviews.content: Very responsive and easy to work with. The appraisal report was comprehensive and well-documented.

certifications: Member of the International Society of Appraisers (ISA)
services: Valuation for estate and insurance purposes

content.about: Reilly Clark Fine Art & Appraisals provides professional art appraisal services specializing in Insurance valuations, Estate liquidations. With Established business experience, we offer expert valuations for insurance, estate planning, charitable donations, and more.
content.notes: Holds a B.A. & M.A. from Stanford and is a Ph.D. candidate at UCSB.

reviews.author: Emily T.
reviews.content: Provided an incredibly thorough appraisal of my art collection. Their knowledge of the market is impressive.

reviews.author: Patricia B.
reviews.content: Excellent service from start to finish. I highly recommend them for any art appraisal needs.

reviews.author: James T.
reviews.content: Extremely professional and knowledgeable. The appraisal was detailed and delivered on time.

business.pricing: Starts at $150; expedited services available with additional fees

specialties: Online art appraisals for general art and collectibles
